text: Night and Day is a 1946 American biographical musical movie directed by Michael Curtiz and starring Cary Grant, Alexis Smith, Selena Royle, Henry Stephenson, Jane Wyman, Dorothy Malone, Eve Arden, Ginny Simms, Paul Cavanagh, Victor Francen, Alan Hale Sr., Donald Woods. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1947. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940s biographical movies Category:1946 musical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:1940s American musical movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Curtiz
title: Night and Day (1946 movie)
